name: dinamo-api
description: An API to get data from a workout database, getting infos such as workout registers, progression, health tracking and more!

scripts.prestart: npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate
scripts.resetall: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all

author: Adson Gomes Oliveira
